mapper.update: update eb_store_visit set product_id = #{productId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, product_type = #{productType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, cate_id = #{cateId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, type = #{type,jdbcType=CHAR}, uid = #{uid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, count = #{count,jdbcType=INTEGER}, content = #{content,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, add_time = #{addTime,jdbcType=INTEGER}, ctime = #{ctime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select id, product_id, product_type, cate_id, type, uid, count, content, add_time, ctime from eb_store_visit where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
